video.title: Digimon Xros Wars
video.synopsis: A human boy is transported into the Digital World, along with his two best friends, where he is charged with saving the Digimon against annihilation.

episodes.synopsis: Mikey, an upbeat seventh-grader who can't resist helping people in trouble, encounters a Digimon named Shoutmon who brings him to the Digital World.
episodes.title: Mikey Goes to Another World

episodes.synopsis: Shoutmon holds a banquet in an attempt to keep Mikey from leaving the Digital World. The evil Bagra Army attacks, and Shoutmon is at a disadvantage.
episodes.title: He Is Shoutmon, Hear Him Roar

episodes.synopsis: Mikey, Angie and Jeremy have aligned with Shoutmon. Still trying to defeat the Bagra Empire, they meet two other humans living in the digital world.
episodes.title: A Rival Appears

episodes.synopsis: With proof that controlling a Code Crown makes you the ruler of that zone, Mikey and Team Fusion Heart hope to protect it from the Bagra Forces.
episodes.title: Island Zone in Chaos!

episodes.synopsis: Evil Neptunemon learns the Code Crown is inside Whamon's belly, so he drops a mixture of DigiByte snacks and bombs to weaken the gigantic Digimon.
episodes.title: Thanks for the DigiCards

episodes.synopsis: When Mikey's team is surrounded by Seadramons on the island, Christopher shows up and offers to help in exchange for the Digi-Memory Card.
episodes.title: Crisis or Conquest

episodes.synopsis: Local Digimon have been rounded up by AncientVolcanomon in an attempt to excavate the Code Crown at the ruins where the Bagra base is located.
episodes.title: Danger Erupts

episodes.synopsis: Mikey and Team Fusion Heart allow themselves to be captured by AncientVolcanomon so they can learn where the Digimon prisons are located.
episodes.title: Meltdown in the Magma Zone!

episodes.synopsis: While Mikey and Dorulumon await their fate in a cell, Christopher shows up to fight Tactimon just in time.
episodes.title: Dorulumon's True Colors!

episodes.synopsis: Mikey goes to the Lake Zone and saves Knightmon. Meanwhile, the Bagra forces led by IceDevimon attack the castle under orders from Laylamon.
episodes.title: The Rival Champions!

episodes.synopsis: Since Mikey is too exhausted to battle, the Fusion Fighters band together under Jeremy's leadership. Angie hears Beastmon talking in her sleep.
episodes.title: Ice to See You, Angie!

episodes.synopsis: While looking for treasure in the Sand Zone, Team Fusion Heart ends up falling into an underground Bagra Base.
episodes.title: Treasure, Traps and Trouble - Oh My!

episodes.synopsis: When Reapmon observes the goddess statue emitting light to Mikey, he recalls his past with the Warriors of the Goddess, who were tragically destroyed.
episodes.title: Mikey, Warrior of the Light!

episodes.synopsis: Mikey and the Fusion Fighters are surrounded by the enemy. Meanwhile, Reapmon takes part in a healing ritual, sacrificing himself to be reborn.
episodes.title: Showdown in the Sand Zone!

episodes.synopsis: Mikey and friends are forced to the Sky Zone, where the police presence is so strong the Bagra Empire can't touch it.
episodes.title: Trouble in Paradise

episodes.synopsis: Lucemon wins the support of the zone's Digimon and becomes the new president. After his election, he reveals his hidden wicked nature.
episodes.title: A Dark Cloud Over the Sky Zone!

episodes.synopsis: Mikey asks Sparrowmon to work with him to save Nene. Sparrowmon then tries to get DarkKnightmon to help them.
episodes.title: Clash in the Clouds

episodes.synopsis: As Jeremy and Angie hide in a temple, Dorulumon returns to Mikey while Tactimon leads Bagra forces to close in on Mikey and Shoutmon.
episodes.title: Welcome to the Jungle Zone!

episodes.synopsis: The Fusion Fighters follow AxeKnightmon and Nene into the jungle's sacred zone in search of the mighty Digimon Deckerdramon.
episodes.title: Rumble in the Jungle Zone!

episodes.synopsis: Mikey reunites with the Fusion Fighters after getting abducted and released by AxeKnightmon. ToyAgumon's gang shows up and steals the Fusion Loader.
episodes.title: Train of Terror!

episodes.synopsis: Mikey's team goes to rescue Nene from prison, but a mind-controlled Christopher stands in their way. Meanwhile, the search is on for the Code Crown.
episodes.title: Disaster in the Dust Zone!

episodes.synopsis: Mikey's stuck between zones until he's picked up by Wisemon, a researcher who wants to learn everything about the Digital World.
episodes.title: Lost in Digital Space

episodes.synopsis: Mikey's team comes to the Shinobi Zone, where it's under attack by Bagra forces led by Musyamon, who has captured the Monitamons' castle and princess.
episodes.title: Laughing All the Way to the Code Crown

episodes.synopsis: Mikey's team defends the Monitamon village and works to rescue the princess. When Musyamon has Jeremy in a tight spot, the Monitamons and Nene help.
episodes.title: Monitamission Impossible!

episodes.synopsis: When Mikey's team comes to the Disc Zone, they discover Christopher is fighting Blastmon in an effort to hang on to the Code Crown.
episodes.title: Showdown in Shaky Town!

episodes.synopsis: Mikey returns the Fusion Fighters and the residents of the Disc Zone to the Shinobi Zone, while Shoutmon questions his abilities.
episodes.title: Shoutmon - Bogus King or the Real Thing?

episodes.synopsis: Team Fusion Heart works together in a bake-off against WaruMonzaemon to rescue the chefs of the Sweet Zone.
episodes.title: Sweet Zone Bake-Off!

episodes.synopsis: Mikey's team slips and falls into the town's underground, but they manage to escape and search for the town's captive Digimon and Cutemon's parents.
episodes.title: Battle in the Digital Depths

episodes.synopsis: Mikey's team comes to the Sword Zone and is attacked by the Bagra Army swordsmen led by Grademon.
episodes.title: Fall of the Final Code Crown

episodes.synopsis: Mikey, Jeremy, Angie and Shoutmon are back home. Meanwhile, Tactimon ends up in the human world too, and revives himself by absorbing digital energy.
episodes.title: When Worlds Collide
